sense.def:
The circulation of a newspaper or magazine
je število prodanih izvodov časopisa ali revije vsakokrat, ko izide nova številka.

seg.quote: The local paper had a circulation of only six thousand.

sense.def:
One's circulation
je gibanje krvi po človekovem telesu.

seg.quote: He stamped his feet from time to time to keep the circulation going.

sense.def:
Denar, ki je
in circulation
, je v javni rabi.
